name: Cult DAO
intro: Empowering and funding those building towards decentralized future
introduce: Cult DAO seeks to fast forward the collapse of the global economic order and to fund the revolutionaries seeking the same goal. CULT is the tradable and liquid token of CULT DAO, transacting CULT will contribute to the protocol by filling the DAO treasury slowly, to fund investments into decentralised technologies. This is achieved due to a 0.4% tax on all CULT transactions.
